body: What happened to the Appeal an Infraction section? I made an appeal about 4 weeks ago and I got one response from Iron saying that they will return to me shortly and I waited 5 days and there was no response. (Not complaining to that but that was part of the process) Then for some reason I cannot find my appeal.

title: Appeals?

replies.body:
Sorry for any inconvenience, your appeal was most likely overlooked and eventually forgotten.
I've taken the liberty of notifying senior staff of your appeal, it will be dealt with shortly.

Just sit tight :^)

Locking...
